3493 - Steel Springs, Except Wire Summary > THOMAS MARSH & CO. PTY. LTD. is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover steel springs, except wire. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. THOMAS MARSH & CO. PTY. LTD. is headquartered in Carole Park, Queensland. It is headed by director & company secretary Janice Margaret Marsh. For the 2025 financial year, the company reported revenue of $28.40 million. Its net profit totalled $1.47 million. THOMAS MARSH & CO. PTY. LTD. forms part of the manufacturing industry sector. Key Personnel > No key personnel were found for the selected company.
